title: How to Assess Psychotropic Drug Adherence
itunes:title: How to Assess Psychotropic Drug Adherence
description:
This episode discusses the assessment of adherence: Self-report, electronic medication monitoring systems, rating scales, medication possession ratio, questions for assessing medication adherence, and the recommended frequency of adherence monitoring. 

Faculty: Martha Sajatovic, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Earn 1 CME: Psychotropic Drug Adherence
  • Assessing Adherence: Self-Report, Rating Scales, Medication Refills, Automated Pill-Taking Frequency Monitoring, Medication Routines, and Duration of Assessments
